Sentencas: Palladium (Pd) is an attractive cathode catalyst component for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) that has high tendency to agglomerate during operation at around 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This work shows that such agglomeration can be inhibited by alloying Co into Pd.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: PdO, Pd0.95Co0.05O, Pd0.90Co0.10O, and Pd0.80Co0.20O were synthesized and characterized.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Powder X-ray diffraction patterns at 750 and 900 degrees C confirmed that PdO decomposition to Pd which normally occurred at 840 degrees C was suppressed for Co containing Pd alloys while thermal gravimetric analyses indicated improved redox reversibility of PdO <-> Pd conversion for alloys during the thermal cycling between 600 and 900 degrees C. Scanning electron microscopy images supported these arguments.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Pd0.90Co0.10+yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrode (i.e., 10 mol % Co containing PdO-impregnated YSZ electrode) displayed the highest oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) performance and stability.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance for ORR on Pd0.90Co0.10+YSZ cathode is only 0.088 Omega cm(2) at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: During polarization test at 750 degrees C, Pd0.90Co0.10+YSZ cathode showed stable performance for 30 h while the performance of Pd+YSZ cathode degraded after 10 h. (C) 2016 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance and stability of nano-structured Co/PdO-co-impregnated Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 cathode for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
